page.name: xaf/dialogs/persistence
page.summary: As a user enters data, values persist through pages because XAF dialogs automatically contain a finite state machine that manages the complete state of dialogs through multiple request/response cycles. This is especially useful for HTTP stateless programming where reporting errors requires pages to be redrawn. Data Persistance allows developers to refresh pages and have data automatically filled into controls regardless of how many times a page is re-displayed to get valid user data.

section.heading: How the Sample Dialog would Automatically Process Errors
